jobDesc: Created a responsive web application using HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, LESS, and AngularJS
Rapidly prototyped user interface concepts for hiring.monster.com
Worked on list of updates and bug fix deliverables for client’s WordPress site using HTML/CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery
Updated, created, and maintained demos using HTML/CSS, JavaScript, and JSON
Developed new user-facing features and built reusable code and libraries for future use
Assure that all user input is validated and optimized for maximum speed and scalability before submitting to back-end
Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders as well as work independently to accomplish given tasks
Worked with CSS (LESS) frameworks, JavaScript frameworks (Backbone), and version control methodologies
Maintained the Shoebuy.com website using HTML5, CSS3, SASS, JavaScript, and jQuery
Integrated the frontend within Java and Perl template code
Used command line, vim and grep searches in daily tasks
Worked on an Agile (Scrum) Development Team to deliver regular updates to business team and project managers
Built landing pages using HTML/CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery
Updated and built components on CVS.com website
Checked accessibility and 508 compliance, and built code to be compatible with all versions of IE back to IE6
Built a responsive web template from scratch using HTML/CSS for WordPress theme based off of PSD given
Increased front-end efficiency by transferring from old CMS to WordPress and brand associated them with Northeastern brand guidelines
Created UX design mockups and converted into web pages
Updated the Boston.com user guide for consumers and advertisers per client specifications using HTML/CSS and JavaScript
Created code to retrieve product information from CSV file using taxonomies on a WordPress e-commerce site

volunteer.summary: Work with nonprofit organization to teach women HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Responsive Design, Wordpress and other web based languages

education.school: The New England Institute of Art

education.major: Intro to ES6, Intro to AngularJS, Intro to ReactJS

projects.name: Interactive Resume
projects.details: This page is built by pulling data from a JSON file and is is displayed using ReactJS

projects.name: Insulin Calculator
projects.details: Built a calculator in AngularJS for type 1 diabetics to take the carbs they have ingested and add their carb to insulin ratio to determine how many units of insulin to take as well as calculate their correction factor to get their blood glucose in normal range and for pump users to calculate how much insulin they should add in their cartridges using Joslin Diabetes Clinic calculation worksheet

projects.name: Momentum Recreated
projects.details: Recreated the Chrome plugin Momentum in both ES6 and jQuery that pulls in a different background image from a collection in the Unsplash API, it displays the current time and based on geolocation or entering a city shows current weather using OpenWeather API and entering a search item display gifs from Giphy API and random quote from wikiQuotes API

projects.name: What’s Your Hashtag
projects.details: Built a NodeJS application that uses Twitter API to get tweets based off of search item entered and displayed using D3.js and is deployed on Heroku
